value.title: ChatGPT vs. Google Bard, round 2: How does the new Gemini model fare?
value.excerpt: The new Gemini-powered Bard keeps the same spirit ("He envisioned a sport that would unite people...") with more concision and focus. Interestingly, GPT-3.5 is the only model we tested to imagine Lincoln as a youth instead of a restless president sitting in the White House.

value.title: Google DeepMind at NeurIPS 2023
value.excerpt: The Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS) is the largest artificial intelligence (AI) conference in the world. NeurIPS 2023 will be taking place December 10-16 in New Orleans, USA.Teams from across Google DeepMind are presenting more than 150 papers at the main conference and workshops.

value.title: How Google DeepMind’s AI breakthrough could revolutionise chip, battery development

value.title: DeepMind tortured ChatGPT to reveal sources
value.excerpt: We ask the questions A team of boffins from Google's DeepMind used a torture method on ChatGPT until it revealed the snippets of the data it was trained on. The boffins used a new type of attack prompt which asked a production model of the chatbot to repeat specific words forever.
